price: 他只以罪恶和丑事命令你们，并教你们假借安拉的名义，而说出你们所不知道的。
arabic: إِنَّمَا يَأۡمُرُكُم بِٱلسُّوٓءِ وَٱلۡفَحۡشَآءِ وَأَن تَقُولُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: innamā yamurukum bil-sūi wal-faḥshāi wa-an taqūlū ʿalā al-lahi mā lā taʿlamūna
